About Me

I am a Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence from FPT University Ho Chi Minh City , And Founder of 9.5AI Club FPTU HCMC. My research focuses on Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, and Deep Learning. I am particularly interested in Visual Question Answering, Relationship Extraction, and text summarization, aiming to develop AI systems that connect academic research with real-world applications.
